name: Match 3 Warriors
description:
Explore a dungeon and battle fearsome monsters within. Use your match 3 skills to attack and defend yourself. Ascend the floors in solo mode, or play against others online in the PvP mode.

Available in French, Spanish, German, Italian, Portuguese and Polish.

  • Explore 50 floors, each more difficult than the last.
  • Test your match 3 skills online against other players online.
  • Improve your arsenal to increase your attack and defence.
